function.name: set_param
function.eval:
('auto_answer_headers', '''Call Info: Answer-After=0
 Call Info: answer-after=0
 Alert-Info: info=alert-autoanswer
 Call-Info: <sip:>;answer-after=0
 Answer-Mode: Auto
 P-Auto-Answer: normal
 Alert-Info: Ring Answer
 Alert-Info: Info=Alert-Autoanswer
 Call-Info:\;Answer-After=0
 Call-Info: answer-after=0''')
